name: Marcel van Gerven
content: Prof. M.A.J. van Gerven (Marcel) | Radboud University Prof. M.A.J. van Gerven (Marcel) Professor - Artificial Intelligence Principal Investigator - Donders Centre for Cognition Principal Investigator - Donders Institute for Brain, Cognition and Behaviour Chair: Artificial Cognitive Systems Contact marcel.vangerven@donders.ru.nl To LinkedIn To X Personal profile Visiting address Thomas van Aquinostraat 4 6525 GD NIJMEGEN Postal address Postbus 9104 6500 HE NIJMEGEN Working days Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday Professor Marcel van Gerven heads the Artificial Cognitive Systems lab in the Department of Machine Learning and Neural Computing of the Donders Institute for Brain, Cognition and Behaviour. He is also director of the Nijmegen ELLIS unit, ELLIS Fellow and he directs the ICAI lab for semiconductor manufacturing. His research focuses on bridging the gap between artificial and natural Intelligence using techniques which have their roots in machine learning and neuromorphic computing. He is a Vidi laureate and recipient of several national and international grants. Tags: Neural networks, machine learning, neuromorphic computing Publications Publication lists Researcher ID: D-7800-2012 Publication list Ancillary activities Advisory board member of xdmd.ai (01 September 2025) About Marcel van Gerven focuses on the development of artificial intelligence (AI) that is inspired by the way in which the human brain works. This provides the basis for smarter and more efficient brain-based technology.
